jobSection.title: Current opportunities
jobSection.description: We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and an affirmative action employer.

jobs.title: Snowflake Developer
jobs.shortDescription: Talented Snowflake Data Engineer who are well versed with Snowflake.

jobs.title: Sales Engineer
jobs.shortDescription: Our Sales team is looking for creative problem solvers who can work on the quality initiatives that will help build the Pentafox Sales team.

benefits.title: Benefits @ Pentafox
benefits.description: Thoughtfully packaged benefits that enhance the lifestyle for every employee keeping in mind their physical and mental wellbeing. Financial wellness is also competitive enough to make it easy for every employee to take good care of self and family (now, and in the future) and so we can build for everyone, together.
